name: Spacecraft
description: Starcraft - a space shooter, in which you have to leave your system and fly to the depths of space, to destroy the army of enemies. You can find several types of weapons, which differ in the rate of fire, ammunition and the way to destroy enemies. Raise the capsules that restore the ship's hull, collect ammunition from enemies, use the engine's power to full, to evade enemy attacks. Do everything in your power to protect your planet from danger.
